name: Lowa Explorer Gore-Tex Mid Hiking Boots - Men's
description: These boots were meant for exploring, with a flexible and protective upper and waterproof membrane. The mid-height collar supports and stabilizes your ankles when carrying heavier packs, and the midsole provides cushion and comfort on the trail.Suede and synthetic upper with a Gore-Tex® waterproof-breathable membrane.Lightweight insole comforts and flexes.DynaPU® midsole cushions underfoot.Vibram® Rock Track® Evo outsole with Megagrip rubber.Aggressive lugs provide traction in loose terrain.Resoleable design lets you give these boots a new life.
